name: Flying Dragon (itch) (Ahad1133N)
description:
simple game you can play freely.

You will play a dragon that flying in the sky and avoid the obstacles.

that is you just have to tap to escape from obstacles in this game.

you can play with friends and try to beat the friends who get the highest score.

Flapy dragon is an endless game based on the very famous ‘Flappy Bird’. We bet you cannot score more than 50 points.

Simple physics, beautiful graphic, and ADDICTIVE game.

Make sure to fly between the pipes without touching your dragon.

Can you score the highest score and beat your friends? Let’s See!
